attributes.action: help people get back on there feet
attributes.additional_details: contact e.s.a or pip or universal  credit
attributes.background: the system for people  coming in country is wrong when people worked 33yrs and get nothing

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107617

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
